title: Linux compress Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux compress command, learn how to compress and decompress files, and discover advanced options for efficient data compression.

meta.title: Linux compress Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux compress command, learn how to compress and decompress files, and discover advanced options for efficient data compression.
meta.keywords: Linux, compress, decompress, compression, archiving, file management, data storage

steps.title: Compress and Decompress Files Using compress Command

verify.name: Verify compressed file creation
verify.hint: The compressed file `example.txt.Z` should be created.

verify.name: Verify decompressed file
verify.hint: The decompressed file `example.txt` should be created.

steps.title: Explore Advanced Options of compress Command

verify.name: Verify compressed output to stdout
verify.hint: The compressed output to stdout should match the original file content.

verify.name: Verify forced compression
verify.hint: The compressed file `example.txt.Z` should be larger than the original `example.txt` file.
